Title: Space Chimps
Overview: Three chimps are sent into space to explore the possibility of alien life when an unmanned space shuttle crash lands on an uncharted planet.
Genres: Animation, Family, Adventure, Comedy, Science Fiction
production_companies: Starz Media, Starz Animation, Odyssey Entertainment, Studiopolis, Vanguard Animation
Cast: Andy Samberg, Cheryl Hines, Jeff Daniels
